job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
• Master's degree or PhD in Computer Science/Engineering, Machine Learning, Mathematics, Physics, or equivalent
  • 4+ years’ professional experience in ML and computer vision
  • A knack for creativity and ability to formulate problems and solve them independently
  • Outstanding skills in Machine Learning especially techniques such as Deep Neural Networks, Random forest, Gradient boosting, Hyperparameter optimization techniques etc.
  • Proficient skills in development of AI/ML applications through state-of-the-art frameworks such as Keras, TensorFlow, and PyTorch
  • Knowledge in programming skills in various languages (e.g., Python, C++, or Java) with proficiency in Python
  • An interest to constantly learn, communicate, interact, share information, and willingness to help others
